item.title: Kim Soo Hyun Goes Through Hell in the First Episode of ‘One Ordinary Day’
item.content:encoded: Coupang Play’s first original series, One Ordinary Day, starring Kim Soo Hyun premiered on November 27th. One Ordinary Day is a Korean remake of the British BBC drama, Criminal Justice.
